dct:title: 2019 University of Miami Gables Campus Drone Survey
dct:creator: Chris Mader;Mader;Chris;;;;Frost Institute for Data Science and Computing, University of Miami;https://ror.org/02dgjyy92;ROR;https://ror.org/
dct:description: High resolution orthographic image of the University of Miami Coral Gables Campus. The image was created from a drone survey of the area.
prov:action:
#########
# GDSC ETL is performed in two steps: shell script to ETL data into postgres
# and then additional transformations with SQL in postGIS (if needed).
####

#########
# Step 1 - bash script (pseudo code)
####

# create directory structure and move into it
mkdir -p /data/umgables_2019_drone_survey/{download,etl} && cd /data/umgables_2019_drone_survey

# set update flag based on last update and update frequency
do_update=0 if date() < last_update + update_frequency else do_update = 1
dcat:contactPoint: University of Miami Libraries, Frost Institute for Data Science and Computing
